name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- [RuleTile] Add RotatedMirror rule which checks neighbors using both the mirror and rotation Rule in addition to the standard rotation Rule

### Fixed
- [GameObjectBrush] Validate size of GameObjectBrush when it changes
